content: {"name": "HARRISBURG CRISIS ASSISTANCE FOOD PANTRY", "alternate_name": "", "description": "AVAILABLE FOR HARRISBURG RESIDENTS ONLY.\n", "email": "", "url": "https://www.harrisburgumc.org/serve/food-pantry/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "7940 Rocky River Road", "address_2": "7940 Rocky River Road", "city": "Concord", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28025", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.3077748, "longitude": -80.597954}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 957-8629", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Financial assistance for some bills, proof required"}]}
